title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 88.6 - Intermingling of operations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 88.6 - Intermingling of operations

State Regulations

Nothing hereinabove contained shall be construed as
prohibiting the use of a common loading platform for both alcoholic and
nonalcoholic beverages; or as precluding the trucking of both such beverages on
a common truck; or the solicitation of orders for both types of beverages on a
common truck; or the solicitation of orders for both types of beverages by an
employee of a wholesale beer licensee who has been issued an appropriate
solicitor's permit by the authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
88.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
